type: Commercial Off the Shelf E-Learning Products RFSO 2023
short_summary: Buys Commercial Off the Shelf E-Learning Products
description: This is a request for standing offer RFSO 2023 of commercial off the shelf e-learning products. The contract is expected to start on December 1st 2023,  and end on November 29th, 2024.
full_summary:
